title: Balance smooth handles on all masters
description: Auto-balances handles for smooth nodes using tangent-based directions and proportional lengths across all masters for selected glyph layers.
code:
from path_utils import balance_smooth_handles
alpha = 0.33
clamp = 0.6
count = 0
for sl in font.selectedLayers:
    g = sl.parent
    for m in font.masters:
        layer = g.layers[m.id]
        count += balance_smooth_handles(layer, alpha=alpha, clamp=clamp)
print(f'Balanced {count} handles total across masters')
